title: Login queue 17000 people
body: Alright-o. After a match I just lost and tilted into oblivion in, the game refused to load the post-game stats. I had to restart the client. So I do and I get a login queue of seventeen THOUSAND. Normally login queue disappears immediately. Now I've been sitting here for 4 minutes-ish waiting for the thing to log me in. Is this for real? It feels like a gigantic bug, especially considering that it's Monday. Yes, it's a free day in many countries in Europe, still doesn't explain anything though. So, riot, what's going on? Bug or legit 17k people trying to log in? lmfao

replies.body: It looks like we had a bit of a slip up behind the scenes, but the login queue should be fixed up now! There's a [**discussion going on here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue) with a Rioter who knows a bit more about what happened, and feel free to join in!

I think it may actually be a login issue with the client. I'm in NA and called in sick but wanted to practice my Rakana and maybe try full tank instead of the usual ap shieldy Rakan. I can't login though. I just get this issue where it looks like it's about to log me in, I get the spinning wheel then it pops up saying cannot log in at this time. There's no login queue, just refuses to log me in. I've tried all 3 of my accounts, made sure my credentials are right, even changed the region and switched back to NA but no luck at all so far.

Edit: Okay, so just after I posted this reply I see a warning icon saying they know people are having login issues xD I guess that answers the question.
